Where we're going, we don't need nosecones.

Oh wait, I already did that one twice..
Naal odahviing jot! It's almost here!

Twitter was updated! More hype people! 

HYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE

Lookie:
Stop the walls!
Omg omg omg omg omg omg it is happppppening

> Engaging HYPErdrive now.

...just NOW??

Still taking readings...

#HYPE

a

STOP THE WALLS OF TEXT!
**more faster**

5 minutes and only 60 pages?!?! FASTER!!
